name: Mahmood Zakhilwal
story: Mustafa Jalali joined the military at a young age, and has served his country for over 20 years. He has been in many dangerous situations and has seen things that most people can only imagine. Despite this, he remains incredibly calm and focused during operations, which makes him an excellent paramedic. Mustafa is married with children, and he misses his family dearly when he is away on missions.
